TEXT: The Royal Protector of the Empress Jessamine Kaldwin. NL He has been framed for the Empress's assassination and now aims to get revenge.
NL Your sword and bolts pierce the heart.

Navigating an unlit street, you come across several hooded figures in the midst of some dark ritual. As you approach, they turn to you in eerie unison. The tallest among them bares fanged teeth and extends a long, pale hand towards you. NL ~"Join~ ~us~ ~Royal~ ~Protector,~ ~and~ ~feel~ ~the~ ~warmth~ ~of~ ~the~ ~Spire."~
